relation: Telescopic attachable accessory container with bookmark for books
Note-pad holder with incorporated page mark/cover strap and writing utensil holder
Devices for marking and tagging books or other writing surfaces
pageTitle: Patent US6481367 - Combination pen holder and bookmark/placesaver - Google Patents
textBeforeTable: Patent Citations In FIG. 6D, the top strap 7, with the pocket 5, has been folded over the bottom strap 9, pulled tight, and secured thereto with Velcro™ strips 10 a (not shown), 10 b. Pens 4 a, 4 b have been inserted into the pocket 5. In FIG. 6C, the bottom strap 9 has been folded over the front of the book cover 2. In FIG. 6B, the book 3 has been closed. The bookmark ribbon 11 marks the page. As shown in FIG. 6A, the reader has laid the length of the device 1 over the inside of a book cover 2. He has used the bookmark ribbon 11 to mark a page and has used the placesaver arrow 12 to mark a place in the text 16. FIG. 5 shows a optional magnifier, which can be used to enhance the usefulness of the placesaver arrow 12. A side of a rectangular magnifier 24, made from plastic or glass, can be attached to the extension 14 of the placesaver arrow 12, ordinarily by sewing or gluing. A protective flap 25, comprising a long rectangular piece of material, is also attached to the extension 14, under the magnifier 24. The Velcro™ closure 26 a on the end of the protective flap 25 mates with a Velcro™ closure 26 b on the extension 14, allowing the reader to fold the protective flap 25 over the magnifier 24, to
